--- select_singer_with_having.sql
SELECT
  SingerID
FROM
  Singers
GROUP BY
  SingerID
HAVING
  SingerID = 1

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    As:       nil,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 9,
          NameEnd: 17,
          Name:    "SingerID",
        },
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   18,
      Source: &ast.TableName{
        Table: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 25,
          NameEnd: 32,
          Name:    "Singers",
        },
        Hint:   (*ast.Hint)(nil),
        As:     (*ast.AsAlias)(nil),
        Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
      },
    },
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: &ast.GroupBy{
      Group: 33,
      Exprs: []ast.Expr{
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 44,
          NameEnd: 52,
          Name:    "SingerID",
        },
      },
    },
    Having: &ast.Having{
      Having: 53,
      Expr:   &ast.BinaryExpr{
        Op:   "=",
        Left: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 62,
          NameEnd: 70,
          Name:    "SingerID",
        },
        Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 73,
          ValueEnd: 74,
          Base:     10,
          Value:    "1",
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT SingerID FROM Singers GROUP BY SingerID HAVING SingerID = 1
